title: [Large-scale] Development of Teacher Collaborative Learning Strategies Through Online Learning Studies (OLS)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational principles and experience using online collaboration tools (Zoom, Google Drive)
context.additional_context: Simulation-based activities to model collaborative learning for teachers in diverse school settings

learning_goals: Learners can form and operate a teacher collaborative learning team by applying the Online Learning Study (OLS) process.
Learners can analyze organizational and cultural differences arising during interdisciplinary (STEM) lesson design using boundary crossing theory.
Learners can design a feedback cycle structure with peer teachers using digital collaboration tools (Zoom/Google Drive).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
